title: Palm Sunday
summary: Palm Sunday is a Christian moveable feast that falls on the Sunday before Easter. The feast commemorates Jesus' triumphal entry into Jerusalem, an event mentioned in each of the four canonical Gospels.[3] Palm Sunday marks the first day of Holy Week.  For adherents of Nicene Christianity, it is the last week of the Christian solemn season of Lent  that precedes the arrival of Eastertide.[4][5]
